_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Support for Ubisys SmartHome ZigBee Devices

hint.en:
Select actions controlled by input 1 on the device.

Depending on the actions, the input will have different impacts on the output, and different Flow cards named "Input 1" will be triggered.

Triggers:

Input 1 - Set on
  Triggered by "on/off switch"
Input 1 - Set off
  Triggered by "on/off switch"
Input 1 - Toggle on or off
  Triggered by "toggle switch" and "dimmer switch"
Input 1 - Increase relative dim-level
  Triggered by "dimmer switch"
Input 1 - Decrease relative dim-level
  Triggered by "dimmer switch"

NOTE 1: For "Push button as dimmer switch", a short press will toggle, a long press will (alternately) dim up or down.

NOTE 2: For "Dual push buttons as dimmer switch", a short press on input 1 will turn on, a short press on input 2 will turn off, a long press on input 1 will dim up and a long press on input 2 will dim down. Only Flow cards named "Input 1" will be triggered by the inputs. For devices with two outputs, output 2 will not be controlled by input 2.

Note 3: For the "dimmer switch" options, the app will trigger "Increase/decrease relative dim-level" Flow cards repeatably every 800 ms as long as the push button is long pressed. The idea is to use them in the "When..." part of a Homey flow and then use a "Set relative dim-level" card in the "Then..." part of the flow. One flow to increase with e.g. +10%, and one flow to decrease with e.g. -10%.

NOTE 4: For "Stationary switch as scene selector", the primary scene is recalled in the "On" state and the secondary scene is recalled in the "Off" state. For "Push button as scene selector", the primary scene is recalled with short press and the secondary scene is recalled with long press. The inputs will not control the outputs and no Flow cards will be triggered by the inputs.

label.en: Dual push buttons as dimmer switch

hint.en:
Select actions controlled by input 2 on the device.

Depending on the actions, the input will have different impacts on the output, and different Flow cards named "Input 2" will be triggered.

Triggers:

Input 2 - Set on
  Triggered by "on/off switch"
Input 2 - Set off
  Triggered by "on/off switch"
Input 2 - Toggle on or off
  Triggered by "toggle switch" and "dimmer switch"
Input 2 - Increase relative dim-level
  Triggered by "dimmer switch"
Input 2 - Decrease relative dim-level
  Triggered by "dimmer switch"

NOTE 1: If the "Dual push buttons as dimmer switch" option is selected for input 1, the selection for input 2 will have no effect. No Flow cards named "Input 2" will be triggered. For devices with two outputs, output 2 will not be controlled by input 2.

Note 2: For the "dimmer switch" options, the app will trigger "Increase/decrease relative dim-level" Flow cards repeatably every 800 ms as long as the push button is long pressed. The idea is to use them in the "When..." part of a Homey flow and then use a "Set relative dim-level" card in the "Then..." part of the flow. One flow to increase with e.g. +10%, and one flow to decrease with e.g. -10%.

NOTE 3: For "Stationary switch as scene selector", the primary scene is recalled in the "On" state and the secondary scene is recalled in the "Off" state. For "Push button as scene selector", the primary scene is recalled with short press and the secondary scene is recalled with long press. The inputs will not control the outputs and no Flow cards will be triggered by the inputs.
Group ID for Input actions with Scene Selection.
Scene ID for Input actions with Scene Selection.
Group ID for Input actions with Scene Selection.
Scene ID for Input actions with Scene Selection.
Group ID for Input actions with Scene Selection.
Scene ID for Input actions with Scene Selection.
Group ID for Input actions with Scene Selection.
Scene ID for Input actions with Scene Selection.

instruction.en:
The device will search for an open ZigBee network to join when you first apply power to it.

 D1-R also offers a push-button behind a tiny hole in the front-face of the device in order to start the inclusion manually.
instruction.nl:
De module zal, zodra deze is voorzien van stroom, op zoek gaan naar een ZigBee netwerk.

 D1-R kan ook aan een ZigBee network worden toegevoegd door een knopje in een klein gaatje aan de voorkant van de module kort in te drukken.
